links.title: Google says phones, tablets also affected by newly discovered security flaws
links.description: Google says a newly discovered security vulnerability initially thought to be linked to most modern computers is actually a threat to smartphones and tablets as well. Reports began circulating Wednesday about a mysterious hardware issue that could cause sensitive data, including user passwords, to become accessible to hackers.

messages.body: $AMZN $TSLA $FB $NVDA $GOOG $NFLX $AAPL Apple Says All Macs, iPhones and iPads Exposed to Chip Security Flaws https://www.bloomberg.com/amp/news/articles/2018-01-05/apple-says-all-macs-iphones-ipads-exposed-to-chip-flaw?__twitter_impression=true

links.title: Apple Says All Macs, iPhones and iPads Exposed to Chip Security Flaws
links.description: Company says recent software updates mitigate Meltdown flaw No known exploits have reached users, company says on website Apple Inc. said all Mac computers and iOS devices, like iPhones and iPads, are affected by chip security flaws unearthed this week, but the company stressed there are no known exploits impacting users.
